properties.name: afterburner.name
properties.description: The name of the Afterburner instance. Used to identify the Afterburner instance, e.g. in response messages.

properties.name: afterburner.remote.call.additional.headers
properties.description: A list of http headers to be added to remote call requests, e.g. {'key1':'value1', 'key2:'value2'}

properties.name: afterburner.remote.call.httpclient.connect.timeout.millis
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for a connection to connect to remote server.

properties.name: afterburner.remote.call.httpclient.socket.timeout.millis
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for a reply to come back from remote server.

properties.name: afterburner.remote.call.httpclient.connection.request.timeout.millis
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds to get a free connection from the http connection pool.

properties.name: afterburner.remote.call.httpclient.connections.max
properties.description: The maximum number of connections in the http connection pool.
